name: dive
description: Cars are short and wide, allowing for a faster "dive" down hills.

name: floorless
description: Coaster is on top of the tracks but has no floor.

name: giga
description: Coaster has at least 300+ foot tall drop.

name: hyper
description: Coaster has at least 1 200+ foot tall drop.

name: launched
description: Rather than a chain lift, the ride is launched up its first hill.

name: onboard sound
description: Speakers are located on the cars for immersive sound the whole ride.

name: shuttle
description: Also called boomerang, the coaster travels to the end of the track and then travels backwards to the beginning.

name: tilt
description: Also called a cliffhanger, a portion of the track stops the train on top and tilts mid ride.

name: twin
description: Coaster has two similar tracks, allowing two trains to run simultaneously and "race" each other.

name: wing
description: Riders are seated on either side of the track rather than on top of or below it.
